page.title: 14Public Services
page.content: In general, public services in {Linwood}are efficient. Three{bus companies and several private contractors provide services as well as a{taxi}company. There is a{Health Centre}containing {doctors}and{dentists surgeries.}There is a{Chemist's}nearby in the Shopping Centre. Most of the shops in Linwood are located in the{Shopping Centre, though there are some others scattered about the town. Within the Shopping Centre, there is also a{Public Library}and{LINFO}which gives advice on legal problems and rights. The main entertainment centre is the{Tweedie Hall}which caters for both young and old. The{police}not only look after law and order, but also hold many events for the community through their {Community Involvement Branch.
